title: Modern Apprenticeship Corporate Mentor Classroom Design Using Digital Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational job-related language proficiency and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Focuses on field-intensive language education using digital devices for medical/legal/technical professionals

learning_goals: Enhancement of instructional design capability applying the 6-stage BOPPPS model (preparation, learning objectives, teaching strategies, productive activities, summary, evaluation)
Acquisition of competency in designing job-specific language education integrating digital technologies (collaboration tools, simulation software, etc.)
Cultivation of ability to develop and operate formative assessment tools for measuring learner engagement and educational effectiveness
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
